## Rez de Ville / Urban Ground Floors 2023

::::: {.columns}
:::: {.column width="70%"}
::: {.callout-note}
## INFORMATION

Date: Sep 22-23, 2023
<br>
Location: School of Architecture and Planning, Massachusetts Institute of Technology

[The 2023 Rez de Ville](https://www.rezdeville.com/): In Transition seminar will delve into the evolving dynamics of urban ground floors amidst modern societal, economic, environmental, and technological shifts and explore the implications of these changes on diverse urban populations. Here is the [talk list](list.pdf). A quick brief of the case can be found [here](../../projects/riverview).
:::
